resources.string: How many times have you watched Friends?
Phoebe says \"He\'s her ______\" to represent relationship between Ross and Rachel in the early episodes.
What Seasons do you find you get the hint that Rachel is pregnant?
What is the name of Phoebe\'s half brother and twin sister?
In season 3 or 4 Joey and Chandler move into Rachel and Monica\'s apartment but then move back to their old one. What persuades them to move back?
Rachel and Monica beat them in a quiz.
Rachel and Monica pay them their rent for 3 months.
Rachel and Monica give Joey and Chandler a kiss for a minute each.
Rachel and Monica kissed for a minute.
What magazine is Joey interviewed in season 8?
Who does Ross take out for Valentines day in season 1?
What name does Joey use when he tells his story about the time he went backpacking across Western Europe?

After hearing a woman passed away in Ross\’ building they visit to look at the apartment seeing she isn’t gone yet. They decide to come in after hearing her memory is nearly gone. What language does she speak mostly?
In the one with Phoebe\’s B-Day Dinner Judy Geller accompanies Rachel and Ross to the restaurant with Emma. A bit later Rachel notices Emma\’s _____ fell on the floor. What fell on the floor?
Which of the two characters have kissed everyone on the show both boys and girls?
Have you watched Friends? Are you a Friends fan? Test your knowledge on this television quiz to see how you do and compare your score to others. Enjoy.
